item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, October 4, 2024 at 6:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Why does man print "gimme gimme gimme" at 00:30? (2017) (167 points | 46 comments)
2. Robert Dennard, DRAM Pioneer, has died (214 points | 19 comments)
3. The Unraveling of Space-Time (47 points | 31 comments)
4. Were RNNs all we needed? (335 points | 147 comments)
5. Canvas is a new way to write and code with ChatGPT (714 points | 509 comments)
6. The Silk Road (2023) (7 points | discuss)
7. Dance training superior to physical exercise in inducing brain plasticity (2018) (254 points | 136 comments)
8. Patent troll Sable pays up, dedicates all its patents to the public (935 points | 294 comments)
9. Go Concurrency vs. RxJS (22 points | 19 comments)
10. IRS Direct File adds 12 additional states, covers more tax situations in 2025 (57 points | 14 comments)
11. The Heart of Unix (2018) (106 points | 51 comments)
12. Why and how we’re migrating many of our servers from Linux to the BSDs (126 points | 48 comments)
13. DOSBox-X: Enhanced Fork of DOSBox for Expanded DOS and Retro PC Support (77 points | 25 comments)
14. Personal Names Around the World (2011) (29 points | 11 comments)
15. MikroPhone: A privacy enhanced, simple and featured RISC-V mobile phone (118 points | 32 comments)
16. Interviewing for Evidence (12 points | 2 comments)
17. Perfctl: A Stealthy Malware Targeting Linux Servers (20 points | 4 comments)
18. UK will give sovereignty of Chagos Islands to Mauritius (158 points | 174 comments)
19. Why does Lisp use cons cells? (1998) (20 points | 14 comments)
20. Correcting the record for Continue and PearAI (72 points | 44 comments)
21. What OS should I drive? (3 points | 2 comments)
22. Cox slows Internet speeds in entire neighborhoods to punish any heavy users (218 points | 131 comments)
23. Mux (YC W16) is hiring a video engineer ( | hide)
24. Skymont: Intel’s E-Cores reach for the Sky (36 points | 5 comments)
25. FLUX1.1 [pro] – New SotA text-to-image model from Black Forest Labs (193 points | 126 comments)
26. Show HN: Zero – DX focused non framework to interact with the DOM (22 points | 1 comment)
27. Sequencing wastewater may be key to getting a grip on the H5N1 bird flu outbreak (24 points | 7 comments)
28. SiteOne Crawler – big tool with no users (16 points | 4 comments)
29. Improving Accessibility Using Vision Models (38 points | 10 comments)
30. US Dept of Energy announces $1.5B in electric grid improvements (143 points | 81 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, October 4, 2024 at 6:20 AM UTC
